name: /leave
description:
You're a hacker alien trying to escape a giant ariship. Use your knowledge and your abilities to escape this misterious place.

Use the arrows to move and z to open your console.

A game created by: Enguenye and Joselco99.

Music used:

Author: Kevin Macleod

 Title: Broken Reality

Licence: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0%22%3EAttribution 3.0 Unported (CC BY 3.0)

 Taken from: https://lamusicagratis.com/musica/musica-de-fondo
